title: Haunted Bunk Beds? The Tallman's Haunted Dream Home
description:
Hi Friends!
I've gotten a good amount of people asking for me to do a paranormal story (ya ya yeahhh you can mock ppl for saying this, but I seriously have been getting a lot..hahahah). I know I have talked about true crime most of the time here on Murder, Mystery & Makeup, but I figured since it's October I could throw one in for some spooky time.
Believer or non believer, life is too short. If you wanna believe in ghosts COOL. WHY NOT. If you think it's a bunch of bull, COOL. WHY NOT. At the end of the day, who cares, live your life and let's make it good.
Love and appreciate you guys SOOOO MUCH and I hope to be seeing you very soon.
xo
Bailey Sarian

Watch the original video here and don't forget to subscribe to my YouTube @BaileySarian!
